paper_abstract: The rotation of the product t-norm provides the tool to show that Lukasiewicz logic cannot be axiomatised as an extension of MTL by means of any set of axioms with at most one variable. As a corollary, also BL cannot be axiomatised from MTL by means of single-variable axioms. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on minimal axiomatisations of some extensions of MTL
